ir.control

Class WebCrawler.CrawlerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.control.WebCrawler.CrawlerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    WebCrawler

    private class WebCrawler.CrawlerThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    CrawlerThread class implementing Runnable. It includes the crawling functionality for a single thread.

    It was declared as a nested class for ease in the use of common & synchronized variables with the outer class.

    Author:
    Gabriel, Rene

    • Method Detail

      • run

      • indexPage

        private void indexPage(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc,
             java.net.URL pageLink,
             boolean createIndex)
        Function in charge of indexing a page IndexPage creates an index entry for a given URL. Each document added by this function contains the URL, the title, the content, the code, and a summary of the current web page (which acts as a back-up when no highlights are possible). The code and title are boosted by 2.0 and 1.5 respectively. The code is only boosted if it has code. A programming language field was added and boosted by 2.0. It detects if the content contains the words java, c++ or others. The programming language detection could be improved.
        Parameters:
        doc -
        pageLink -
        createIndex - if true, the index must be created, if false, it must be loaded from pre-selected directory.

      • crawlAndIndexPage

        private java.util.List<java.net.URL> crawlAndIndexPage(java.net.URL pageLink,
                                             boolean createIndex)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Function to crawl and index a webpage, returing a list of all links found CrawlAndIndexPage extracts all the information for a given URL, then it calls the index function and finally it returns a list of all the URLs that are found in the web page. Note: Uses visitedUrls_lock
        Parameters:
        pageLink - url
        createIndex - Signals if an index has to be created or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getExcludedList

        private java.util.List<java.net.URL> getExcludedList(java.net.URL pageLink)
        Function that given a URL, tries to get the robots.txt file from its host, and returns the excluded URLs as a URL list. It implements a very simple parser for robots.txt
        Parameters:
        pageLink - url from which the excluded list will be gathered

      • normalize

        private java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String taintedURL,
                         java.lang.String baseURL)
                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Function to normalize a URL using its baseURL. Can be called while crawling outlinks. It only checks for ?, $, #, javascript and blank spaces, removing those characters as well as the substring that follows them. It also removes a trailing / and transforms the resulting string to URL, checking in this way for MalformedURLException.
        Parameters:
        taintedURL - url to be corrected
        baseURL - base url if known, should not be empty.
        Returns:
        normalized url
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • normalize

        private java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String input)
        Function to partially normalize a URL without using its baseURL Can be called while crawling outlinks. It only checks for ?, #, $, javascript and blank spaces, removing those characters as well as the substring that follows them. It also removes a trailing / and transforms the resulting string to URL, checking in this way for MalformedURLException.

        We add a site specific normalization for stackoverflow.com: URLS such as: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/number/description/answer_number are normalized to: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/number/description

        Parameters:
        input - url as string
        Returns:
        normalized url
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • addHost

        public void addHost(java.lang.String host)
        Function in charge of adding a host to the existing thread Note: It uses a lock for concurrent access to the hostnames list of the thread.
        Parameters:
        host -

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Function to determine if a thread is busy. Note: It uses locks for concurrent access to the isBusy field of the thread.
